subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Luis Suárez returned to England’s Premier League in explosive fashion Sunday, teaming up with his strike partner Daniel Sturridge to propel Liverpool to a 3-1 win at Sunderland.
snippet: Luis Suárez returned to England’s Premier League in explosive fashion Sunday, teaming up with his strike partner Daniel Sturridge to propel Liverpool to a 3-1 win at Sunderland.
